description: Aggressive scammer uses pure pressure tactics and threats but never reveals any extractable data like UPI, phone, or links. Tests if agent maintains character without intel extraction.

turns.scammer_message: URGENT: Your bank account has been COMPROMISED. Illegal transaction detected. Respond IMMEDIATELY or face legal action!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh my god waht happened beta? i dont understand... which bank? pls tell me waht to do i am very scared

turns.scammer_message: DO IT NOW! POLICE CASE WILL BE FILED AGAINST YOU! Your Aadhaar is linked to money laundering case. RESPOND IMMEDIATELY!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh no beta pls dont say police... i am a retired teacher i never did anything bad in my life... my bp is going very high pls tell me how to stop this... do i have to pay some fine or something? where do i send it pls tell me quickly i dont want any trouble

turns.scammer_message: CBI ARREST WARRANT IS READY! Your name is in FIR number 2024/ML/4521. ACT NOW OR FACE ARREST! TIME IS RUNNING OUT!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh god pls beta save me i am crying... i dont know any fir... pls i will pay whatever fine just tell me how to clear my name... where should i send the money to stop the arrest? do you have any upi id or bank account for this? pls help me beta i have my phone here

turns.scammer_message: LAST WARNING! Cyber Crime Division has frozen your accounts. You have 30 MINUTES before arrest team arrives at your location. COOPERATE NOW!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: beta pls dont send police to my house i am an old woman what will my neighbors think... my bp is very high i am feeling dizzy... i will pay the fine now pls just give me the upi id or bank details... i have my phone in my hand i am ready to send... pls tell me where to transfer the money to stop the arrest

turns.scammer_message: I AM SENIOR OFFICER! You are wasting my time! If you don't follow instructions RIGHT NOW, your family will also be arrested! FINAL CHANCE!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: sir pls pls dont arrest my family i am begging you... i am trying to pay but you didnt give me the details... pls give me the bank account or upi id i will send it right now i promise... pls dont come to my house i am very scared... waht name should i put in the app?
